mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article(title, summary, content, cover_url, views, likes, comments, publish_time, update_time, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary} ,#{content}, #{coverUrl}, #{views}, #{likes}, #{comments}, #{publishTime}, #{updateTime}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, summary, content, cover_url AS coverUrl, views, likes, comments, publish_time AS publishTime, update_time AS updateTime, deleted, category_id AS categoryId FROM article WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0

select id, title, summary, content, cover_url AS coverUrl, views, likes, comments, publish_time AS publishTime, update_time AS updateTime, deleted, category_id AS categoryId FROM article WHERE deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, cover_url = #{coverUrl}, views = #{views}, likes = #{likes}, comments = #{comments}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE article SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE article SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE article SET comments = comments + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE article SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
